name: Big Asteroid
description:
An endless asteroid game with upgrades inspired by the original "Asteroids" game by Atari® in 1979. Made for a school project over a few days.

Features
  • Endless
  • Upgrades
  • Highscore
Controls
  • Move with: W, A, S, D, or Arrow Keys
  • Aim with: Mouse
  • Shoot with: Mouse 0/Left Mouse Button
